You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &ccaron;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ccaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/010c/index.htm U+0010C].
  * `&ccaron;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/010d/index.htm U+0010D].
